member_organisations: The updated list of members is available on the VIPA website: http://vipa-international.org/members
fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: VIPA International is a liaison organisation to the CEN TC 88 WG 11 Vacuum insulation products (VIP)
goals__remit: VIPA International mission statement is to act as the global voice of the vacuum insulation panel industry, promote quality and raise awareness about the potential of saving space and energy costs and reducing carbon dioxide emissions in a wide range of applications and industries.
legal_status: 501 (c) (6) not-for-profit association incorporated under the law of the State of Delaware in the United States of America
